reviewText:
Your child will love it!  You?  Maybe not ha ha

But if you want another way to input phonics in the brain of your children, this is a really great way.  My suggestion, turn it on and leave the room LOL!  Once was okay, twice was too much for me, though I have to admit, I learned something new!  :)

I teach first grade students and in the winter we often have days where the kids can't go out for recess.  We watch a few minutes of this movie and the kids love it.  All of them.  They sing the songs and I believe that it is helping them to learn phonics.
Our 7-year old son loves these videos.  It keeps him motivated and interested in learning words.  When we travel, we have them in the DVD player.
I loved it while in Kindergarten - now I'm teaching 2nd I don't have much use for it but still am glad I purchased it .

Very  attractive in color and sound. Really gets the youngsters attention and holds it.  I will let them just play in her play room and she listens continuously as she plays which helps her to retain the information.
DVD is poor quality, I need to return it cos it freezes. We only watched it twice. Content is good but they need to use better DVD.

I don't usually write reviews but this product deserves a review. I don't want to restate what the previous reviews have shared. I agree with them. This is my favorite phonics dvd. My granddaughter loves it. The music is very engaging. She is reading at second grade level and going into first grade. I put the dvd on in the car to and from camp, I am using it as a summer review of all the long vowels sounds. Short vowel sounds are covered in the the Rock and Learn phonics number one. I would estimate the video covers between 200 and three hundred words. Each sound has at least 5 examples. Covers the r controlled vowels nicely too. In fact, I am buying a second one for a friend who's son is a struggling reader and going into third grade...as a summer review. Also great is the Electric Company series now on dvd. I just found out the new Electric company is on tv. You can't put a value on the importance of phonics in becoming an good reader! My favorite phonics program is the Triple Spin Reading Wheel...phenominal!30 Day Reading Wheel

I had reviewed Phonics 1 in the past and found this to be great for pre-K students, and Phonics 2 is a great follow-up to the first DVD going into more complex words and concepts. My daughter is going into first grade this next year and I can tell that this would be a great DVD for any first grade student.

With the use of great music and repetition, this DVD hits home the point of the importance of learning to read. What I loved about this DVD is that it makes reading fun, and I can tell that as a child you would just want to watch this to "rock out" as well as simply having fun with the on-screen characters.

All-in-all, this DVD provides kids a great way to learn!
As a teacher this is a great supplemental resource for your phonics program. You can set up a video station for kids that need extra practice
Wonderful series, my kids love it!
Useful

Love love this DVD! I play this in the car for my kids (ages 2,5, and 9). They sing along (even my 2 yr old) and learn at the same time. It is a good and fun way to learn some basic reading. I have Volume 1 and as soon as they knew that dvd by heart, I started to play Volume 2.
Good product, fast shipping, would order again
It is okay
great learning DVD.
Wonderful for my grand children
i own all of them and they are great. if your kids wants to be "entertained" then this may bore them, but it is very educational and my kids do watch them.
I've already used the cd in class. My 1st and 2nd grade students have been enjoying it.  It is great that it demonstrates a person mouthing out the sound.  Thank you!!!
I used it for my K classroom.
Bought for a student of mine and he really enjoys learning from the DVD.

My grandchildren (who are not picky) did not like this or the other Rock 'N Learn dvds AT ALL!!  While there's nothing wrong with the content, the music was way too loud and almost totally prevented one from hearing the lesson. Much too distracting.
Good the outside paper was scratches
Catchy tunes for my daughter.  We love it.
This a great tool for learning phonics!
Great learninh dvd.
Awesome
The copy appears sticky at the beginning and half way through the disk. The rest of the disk plays fine
My son loves this series.  He soaks up the information and finds it to be entertaining.  He pretty much has the whole 70 min show down after a couple watches, but still wants to watch over and over.
